name.baseName: Silver foil material ; Silver metal ingot ; Hot rolled billeting + cold drawing ; All sizes; NESPS2
银箔材 ; 银金属锭 ; 热轧开坯+冷拔 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Silver FoilisOil Separation + physical precipitation

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Silver FoilisOil Separation + physical precipitation
technology.technologicalApplicability: 由银金属锭制成的银箔材料，经过热轧开坯和冷拔工艺，用途广泛。这种高质量材料可用于电子行业的导电应用，制造电气触点，在需要卓越热电性能的各种组件上镀层，以及由于其光亮的表面而用于装饰。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码3253文件，在完整版文件中第5117页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisOil Separation + physical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management73
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是隔油+物理沉淀，其效率为73，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设施年运行时间（小时）/企业年正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisOil Separation + physical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是隔油+物理沉淀，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设施年运行时间（小时）/企业年正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste waterisOil Separation + physical precipitation
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是隔油+物理沉淀，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
源文件中描述为为银箔材，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
